address: 2/254 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
An Unbeatable Location And Lifestyle Awaits You
UNDER OFFER IN 24 HOURS | Offering a walk-to-everywhere lifestyle and enjoying a prime position in this family oriented community, this delightful unit is close to all the conveniences on offer. With leading schools, transport and boutique shops only 350m down the road.
~ A roomy master bedroom with a walk-in-robe and semi-ensuite gets a big tick, as does a sizeable second bedroom with built-in-robes.
~ A considered floorplan facilitates the savvy use of space throughout this residence, beginning with the open lounge/dining area, which flows from the kitchen.
~ Glass sliding doors in the dining room and a natural color pallet throughout are responsible for the illuminated interiors of this home, giving it a refreshing coastal vibe.
~ A neatly kept kitchen provides ample pantry and bench space, LG dishwasher and double fridge cavity.
~ Paved outdoor entertaining area.
~ A host of other features include ducted heating, 1.5 car garage, automatic watering system with timer and a 2000lt water tank for garden use.

Unlimited Potential On 1000sqm (Approx.)
UNDER OFFER IN 1 WEEK | Positioned in a family-friendly and whisper quiet street, there is a feeling of being a million miles away from it all in this welcoming family home.
~ Three spacious bedrooms with robes.
~ Free flowing lounge and dining area with wood fire and ceiling fans.
~ Updated kitchen offers dishwasher and 6-burner Westinghouse stove.
~ Entertainers will love the multiple options for alfresco dining, overlooking the level rear yard that is fenced and secure for children and pets to enjoy.
~ Side access to a large 25ft x 30ft (approx) shed with power, and additional 10ft x 10ft (approx) shed for storage.
With all you could wish for at your doorstep, it's ready to move into as is. The property also offers superb scope to renovate to a dream design and capitalise on this tranquil, and very special, bushland setting.

Guaranteed To Steal Your Heart
Situated on over 1500m2 (approx) block, this one owner home is set in a quiet side street and in such a tranquil setting.
This property has never been offered for sale before. The current owners have been here for over 30 years.
Featuring four bedrooms, ensuite and walk in robe to the master bedroom, large lounge, dining area and separate family room which opens up onto the magnificent covered pergola area. For those creature comforts we have ducted heating, split system air conditioning, dishwasher and a whole lot more to offer.
Outside we have a old fashioned deck and verandah, ideal to sit and watch the world pass you by plus there is a four car carport to store all those toys.
The backyard is full of established fruit trees - ideal for those who like to make jam!
This is one property that you would be proud to make your home. Don't miss out call now.

address: 2/330 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Just like a HOUSE!!
Located in the heart of Crib Point, with its own street frontage, this remarkable residence sets the bar higher in terms of comfort, convenience, location and size.
Showcasing multiple indoor living spaces, the home features a comfortable formal lounge, adjoining kitchen, dining area, and private courtyard.
Those looking to downsize on maintenance but not on space or amenities will appreciate the fabulous kitchen, comprising stainless steel appliances plus plenty of cupboard and bench space. Three bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR's, family-sized bathroom is well presented and contains a separate bath, shower and adjoining toilet.
It's the small details that makes this home truly unique, comfort-enhancing inclusions list as; gas ducted heating, ducted refrigerated air conditioning, additional gas wall furnace and double lock up garage with built in storage.
One of the best features of this home is the location, with easy access to the railway station, shops, primary schools and only a short drive to some of the best restaurants and wineries the Mornington Peninsula has to offer.
Your search is over-it doesn't get better than this!
